entry.title: WIND WARNING , Masset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Masset Municipal Airport 01:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
